EmailTemplate.name: CWD Grad Invite SSH Grad 3
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
INVITATION TO YOUR GRADUATION
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Congratulations, you have completed your Challenge with Distinction award!
We would love to reward you with your certificate at the 2012 Graduation Ceremony.
Where: IET 2 Savoy Place Westminster London WC2R 0BL
When: Sunday 14th October
1pm - 3:30pm
WWW.THECHALLENGESOCIETY.ORG /thechallengeNETWORK
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
